name: Introduction to Ceramics
description: A general overview of the art of ceramics with an introduction to the basic tools and materials used in the craft.

name: Ceramics I
description: An introduction to the fundamental processes of creating objects in clay with an emphasis on hand-building techniques.

name: Ceramics II
description: A continuation of Ceramics I with an introduction to wheel-throwing and glazing techniques.

name: Advanced Ceramics
description: A more in-depth exploration of the craft of ceramics, with an emphasis on glazing, firing, and finishing techniques.
